item.title: 投资者看到了米莱伊结束国有石油公司争夺战的途径
item.description: 在美国针对阿根廷主要石油生产商的数十亿美元的判决中，哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）看到了一线希望：至少在一些投资者看来，这位自由主义领袖有机会最终结束这场旷日持久的法律纠纷。【原文：There is a silver lining for Javier Milei in a multibillion-dollar US judgment targeting Argentina’s main oil producer: At least some investors see the libertarian leader as having a shot at finally putting an end to a long-running legal saga.】

item.title: 就业数据强劲，债券交易员放弃七月降息押注
item.description: 6 月份的就业报告强于预期，促使交易商放弃对美联储本月降息的押注，国债随之暴跌。【原文：Treasuries tumbled after a stronger-than-expected jobs report for June prompted traders to exit bets on an interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve this month.】

item.title: 薪资增长超预期，美股期货涨幅扩大
item.description: 数据显示就业增长超出预期，提振了投资者对经济健康状况的信心，美国股指期货随之上扬。【原文：US stock futures advanced after data showed job growth exceeded expectations, boosting investors’ confidence in the health of the economy.】

item.title: 加拿大货物贸易逆差因黄金出货量增加而缩小
item.description: 加拿大对美国的出口份额至少降至 1997 年以来的最低水平（不包括科威德大流行），而对其他国家的出口则创下新高。【原文：Canada’s share of exports destined for the US shrank to the smallest proportion since at least 1997, excluding the Covid pandemic, while shipments to other countries reached a new high.】

item.title: 美国薪资增长超出预期，失业率降至 4.1
item.description: 美国 6 月份的就业增长连续第四个月超过预期，失业率也有所下降，这表明尽管经济放缓，但劳动力市场仍在保持稳定。【原文：US job growth exceeded expectations in June for a fourth straight month and the unemployment rate fell, showcasing a labor market that is holding up despite a slowing economy.】

item.title: BBVA 计划将 SRT 与 40 亿欧元企业贷款挂钩
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙对外银行（BBVA SA）正在就与企业贷款相关的重大风险转移问题向投资者征求意见。【原文：BBVA SA is sounding out investors for a significant risk transfer linked to corporate loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国吉利品牌携纯电动和混合动力 SUV 进入意大利市场
item.description: 亿万富翁李书福的吉利汽车控股公司将首次以其同名品牌进入意大利，这将扩大中国汽车制造商在欧洲的扩张。【原文：Billionaire Li Shufu’s Geely Automobile Holdings will enter Italy for the first time with its namesake brand, extending a push by Chinese carmakers to expand in Europe.】

item.title: 贸易期限临近，特朗普的越南协议引发亚洲担忧
item.description: 越南与美国达成的贸易协议为亚洲各国政府敲响了警钟，它们正在努力应对高关税将继续存在的现实。【原文：Vietnam’s trade deal with the US is a wake-up call for Asian governments grappling with the reality that higher tariffs are here to stay.】

item.title: 古根海姆的沃尔什称美联储现在有降息空间
item.description: 古根海姆合伙人投资管理公司（Guggenheim Partners Investment Management）首席投资官安妮-沃尔什（Anne Walsh）表示，随着不确定性的上升和关税的影响波及整个经济，美联储还有降息的空间。【原文：The Federal Reserve has room to cut interest rates as elevated uncertainty and the impact of tariffs ripple across the economy, said Anne Walsh, chief investment officer of Guggenheim Partners Investment Management.】

item.title: 美国打击移民活动期间，敦促影响者避开热点话题
item.description:
律师们建议内容创作者，参与政治话题可能会带来严重风险 

Lawyers are advising content creators that weighing in on political topics can come with serious risks 

】

item.title: 苏黎世保险收购加拿大保险技术公司 BOXX
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团（Zurich Insurance Group AG）同意收购加拿大网络风险管理公司 BOXX Insurance Inc，标志着这家瑞士保险公司向保险技术领域的最新进军。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group AG agreed to buy BOXX Insurance Inc, a Canadian cyber risk management firm, marking the Swiss insurer’s latest push into the insurance technology sector.】

item.title: 重油供应减少，美国炼油商比以往更加依赖页岩油
item.description: 随着来自墨西哥等地的密度较高的石油品种减少，美国炼油商比以往任何时候都更加依赖于来自该国最大页岩盆地的石油供应。【原文：American refiners are relying on oil supplies from the country’s biggest shale basins more than ever as flows of denser varieties from places like Mexico ebb.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员在六月会议上指出欧元走强的危险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行官员在介绍其 6 月份第八次降息的会议时强调了欧元上涨给出口商带来的潜在危险。【原文：European Central Bank officials highlighted potential dangers for exporters from gains in the euro, according to an account of their June meeting that brought an eighth cut in interest rates.】

item.title: 贝森特认为美联储 "有点偏"，两年期利率发出信号
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特质疑美联储决策者对利率的判断，重申他认为两年期国债收益率是基准利率过高的信号。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent questioned Federal Reserve policymakers’ judgment on interest rates, reiterating his view that two-year Treasury yields are a signal that their benchmark rate is too high.】

item.title: 加拿大液化天然气是全球天然气供应过剩的第一个迹象
item.description:
新的生产浪潮— 迄今为止最大的生产浪潮— 可能会改变燃料市场。【原文：

A tidal wave of new production — the biggest yet — could transform the market for the fuel.

】

item.title: 美国 6 月份就业报告分析
item.description: 一名工人在纽约组装桥式通风器。摄影师：Mark Kauzlarich/Bloomberg【原文：A worker assembles a bridge ventilator in New York. Photographer: Mark Kauzlarich/Bloomberg】

item.title: 梅赛德斯到 LVMH 集团阻碍了欧盟对抗特朗普关税的斗争
item.description: 德国汽车制造商梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（Mercedes-Benz Group AG）、法国奢侈品巨头路易威登集团（LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SE）和其他欧洲大公司正带头发起一场企业运动，削弱欧盟抵御唐纳德-特朗普关税威胁的努力。【原文：German automaker Mercedes-Benz Group AG, French luxury giant LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SE and other major European firms are spearheading a corporate push that’s weakening the European Union’s efforts to stand up to Donald Trump’s tariff threats.】

item.title: Meta's Threads 为重新获得相关性做出改变
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将报道 Meta Threads 的一些变化，以及这些变化是否足以使该社交网络获得文化相关性。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner reports on some changes to Meta’s Threads and whether it’s enough for the social network to gain cultural relevance.】

item.title: 贝森特希望稳定币主导美元地位的愿望遭遇反击
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济学编辑。今天，我们将关注美元稳定币的潜在反弹。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果你还没有注册，可以在这里注册。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at potential pushback against dollar stablecoins. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 对于巴西的犯罪分子来说，咖啡豆是他们的目标
item.description:
农民和行业组织警告说，目前正在进行的收获季节可能会成为近期记忆中最糟糕的抢劫年。【原文：

Farmers and industry groups are warning that the harvest season now underway could go down as the worst heist year in recent memory.

】

item.title: 特朗普的美越贸易协定招致中国的严厉指责
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府希望在美国独立日前后宣布至少一些有限的协议，为其 "解放日 "关税的 90 天缓和期划上句号。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration is looking to bookend the 90-day reprieve from his “Liberation Day” tariffs with at least some limited agreements announced around the US Independence Day holiday weekend.】

item.title: 印度可能在贸易协议中允许从美国进口转基因动物饲料
item.description: 印度在寻求与华盛顿达成贸易协议的过程中，可能会允许进口一些经过加工的转基因美国农产品，这是在新德里反对转基因玉米和大豆流入之后印度可能做出的让步。【原文：India may allow imports of some processed, genetically modified US farm products as it seeks to strike a trade deal with Washington, a potential concession after New Delhi opposed inflows of GM corn and soybeans.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴寻求从可兑换阿里健康的债券中获得 15 亿美元资金
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）正寻求通过出售可兑换为阿里巴巴健康信息技术有限公司（Alibaba Health Information Technology Ltd.）股票的债券融资 120 亿港元（15 亿美元）。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is seeking to raise HK$12 billion ($1.5 billion) from the sale of bonds exchangeable into shares of Alibaba Health Information Technology Ltd.】

item.title: 原油下跌，卢布走强，俄罗斯石油收入降至两年来最低点
item.description: 由于全球原油价格下跌，卢布升值，这意味着每桶原油给克里姆林宫带来的卢布减少，俄罗斯 6 月份的石油收入跌至两年来的最低点。【原文：Russia’s oil revenue in June slumped to a two-year low as global crude prices fell and the ruble strengthened, meaning each barrel brought fewer rubles to the Kremlin.】

item.title: 嘉鲁达航空称正在洽谈购买多达 75 架波音飞机
item.description: 印尼加鲁达航空公司首席执行官表示，该公司正在洽谈购买数十架波音公司的飞机，因为这家陷入困境的国旗航空公司正寻求扩大其国际网络。【原文：PT Garuda Indonesia is in talks to buy scores of Boeing Co. aircraft as the distressed flag carrier seeks to expand its international network, its CEO said.】

item.title: 卡莱尔正在商谈将丹尼斯转手给私人借贷者的事宜
item.description: Carlyle Group Inc. 正在洽谈将 Dainese SpA 的钥匙交给债权人 HPS Investment Partners 和 Arcmont Asset Management，这是意大利首批潜在的私人信贷收购之一。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. is in talks to hand over the keys to Dainese SpA to creditors HPS Investment Partners and Arcmont Asset Management, in one of the first potential private credit takeovers in Italy.】

item.title: 让您投资未来的 ETF
item.description:
一些发行商试图效仿凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的ARKK ETF，希望吸引寻找下一个大创意的投资者。【原文：

Attempting to emulate Cathie Wood’s ARKK ETF, some issuers are hoping to attract investors looking for the next big idea.

】

item.title: 萨凡纳将经济赌注押在了现代汽车大工厂上。现在它必须找到工人
item.description: 这座以花园和哥特式神秘风格著称的历史名城，正在不遗余力地帮助韩国汽车巨头为其未来型新工厂配备员工。【原文：The historic city, known for gardens and gothic mystery, is leaving no stone unturned as it helps the South Korean auto giant staff up a futuristic new factory】

item.title: 特朗普的越南协议显示中国关税不会进一步下降
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与越南达成的新贸易协议发出了一个明确的信号，即美国对中国商品征收关税的最终落脚点可能在哪里，而华盛顿和中国政府之间的谈判在最近休战之后仍在继续。【原文：President Donald Trump’s new trade deal with Vietnam sends a clear signal about where US tariffs on Chinese goods might ultimately land, as talks between Washington and Beijing continue following their recent truce.】

item.title: 旅游业受挫，肯尼亚经济增长下滑
item.description: 受旅游业和制造业拖累，肯尼亚第一季度经济产出放缓幅度超出预期。【原文：Kenya’s first-quarter economic output slowed more than expected, weighed down by its tourism and manufacturing sector.】
